text: Orufy collects information under the direction of its customers and has no direct relationship with the individual Users whose personal data it processes.

data_type: detail for respective social medium app
text:
Privacy Policy

1 . When you use our shopify/wordpress plugins we collect details for respective social media app.
We also have to collect the device data to understand the different types of users on different devices at different locations which will allow us to improve our website, products and services.

Privacy Policy

data_type: personal information we process on behalf of customer
text:
Orufy will retain Personal Information we process on behalf of our customers for as long as needed to provide services to our customer.
Orufy will retain and use this Personal Information as necessary to comply with our legal obligations, resolve disputes, and enforce our agreements.
